carousel2: House Tax, Water Tax and Certificates available online
carousel3: Towards a clean, safe and smart city
announce1: Cleanliness drive to be organized in municipal area on 15 January 2025.
announce2: Last date for water tax payment fixed as 31 March 2025.
announce3: New birth and death certificate services now available online.
announce4: Street light expansion scheme started in Gopalganj municipal area.
news1: Municipal Council successfully expands digital services for citizens.
news2: Special cleanliness drive launched under Swachh Bharat Mission.
news3: New welfare schemes announced for citizen benefit.
houseTaxDesc: Pay your property tax securely online and save time.
aboutIntro: The Gopalganj Municipal Council E-Portal has been developed to provide various government services to citizens online. This portal helps citizens avail various services from the comfort of their homes.
aboutMunicipalityDesc: Gopalganj Municipal Council is a local body located at Gopalganj district headquarters in Bihar. It is responsible for city administration, development and management of civic amenities. Its primary objective is to build a clean, safe and well-organized city.
visionDesc: To build an ideal and developed city by providing transparent, timely and digital services to citizens.
missionDesc: To ensure effective and convenient urban development, sanitation, health services, water supply, road facilities and revenue collection.
function3: Property tax and water tax collection
function4: Issuance of birth and death certificates
function5: Urban development schemes implementation and street lighting
mayorMessage: Hearty welcome to all citizens from Gopalganj Municipal Council. Our goal is to provide better services to citizens and make the city clean, beautiful and developed. All services have become simple and convenient through the digital portal. With citizen cooperation, we can achieve this goal.
contactIntro: For any information, suggestions or grievances related to Gopalganj Municipal Council, citizens may contact us through the details provided below.
citizenHelpDesc: The Municipal Council provides various assistance services to citizens. Citizens can contact us through the following channels for their problems, complaints, and suggestions.
citizenHelpPoint1: Complaint Registration: Complaints related to water supply, roads, drains, garbage collection, etc. can be registered.
citizenHelpPoint2: Certificate Services: Applications can be made for birth certificates, death certificates, income certificates, etc.
citizenHelpPoint3: Tax Payment: Property tax and water tax can be paid online or at the office.
citizenHelpPoint4: Timeline: All complaints are resolved within 15 days.
servicesIntro: Gopalganj Municipal Council provides various services to citizens through simple and digital means. Citizens can avail the services listed below as per their requirements.
service1Desc: Register the birth of a newborn child and obtain a birth certificate. This service is fully available online.
service2Desc: Apply for registration of death and issuance of death certificate. Get your certificate within 7 days.
service3Desc: Facility to register marriage and obtain marriage certificate. Registration under Hindu Marriage Act 1955.
service4Desc: Pay your property tax online and save time. Quick payment with instant receipt.
service5Desc: Pay outstanding water tax dues online and save time.
service6Desc: Register complaints and issues related to municipal services and track status online.
schemesIntro: Gopalganj Municipal Council runs various schemes for the welfare of citizens. Citizens can avail benefits from the schemes listed below.
scheme1Desc: This mission is run by the Municipal Council for city sanitation and health improvement. It includes community toilets, solid waste management and cleanliness drives.
scheme2Desc: This scheme is run to ensure continuous and clean water supply in the municipal area. Tap water and hand pump facilities are available.
scheme3Desc: This scheme is run for construction, repair and lighting of roads in the municipal area. Road safety and blacktopping work.
scheme4Desc: Construction and improvement of drains for rainwater and sewage disposal. Proper drainage of rainwater.
